title: Partial disconnection
body: In most games I get a partial disconnection.  All minions stop moving and I can't attack anything.  I can still move my character around, I still see other characters moving on the mini map, chat still works.

replies.body:
The symptoms you're describing are consistent with what most players describe when they're experiencing high packet buffering or packet loss. These issues are typically caused by problematic local network settings or issues along your route to the server. A great first step is to ensure your local settings are good by working through [our guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you continue to have issues with this after taking those steps.
